meta.description: Determine the number of oranges and grapefruits to eat to meet vitamin requirements while minimizing sugar intake.

sets.name: FRUITS
sets.description: Types of fruits available for consumption.

params.name: vitamin_c
params.description: Units of vitamin C per fruit.

params.name: vitamin_a
params.description: Units of vitamin A per fruit.

vars.name: x
vars.description: Number of each type of fruit to eat.

objective.name: min_total_sugar
objective.description: Minimize the total sugar intake from the fruits.

constraints.name: vitamin_c_requirement
constraints.description: Ensure at least 80 units of vitamin C are consumed.

constraints.name: vitamin_a_requirement
constraints.description: Ensure at least 70 units of vitamin A are consumed.

constraints.name: preference_for_oranges
constraints.description: The number of oranges must be at least twice the number of grapefruits.
